## Run.scheduledFor property

The time [RFC3339 date/time format](https://docs.influxdata.com/influxdb/v2.3/reference/glossary/#rfc3339-timestamp) used for the run's `now` option.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
scheduledFor?: string;
```
